name: Yungoos
description: With its sharp fangs, it will bite anything. It did not originally live in Alola but was imported from another region.

abilities.name: Stakeout
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
abilities.description: Doubles the damage dealt to the target's replacement if the target switches out.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.effect: Strengthens biting moves to 1.5× their power.
abilities.description: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power.

abilities.name: Adaptability
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.
abilities.description: Powers up moves of the same type.
